h3_title: Yoaguai Chief - Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
content: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind are a duo of heads that will use two elements to attack, both causing fire damage. As you may have guessed through this Chapter so far, the Fireproof Mantle is one of the best bits of equipment you can bring along with you. Quick as Fire is the head on the ground that will roll toward you, leaving trails of fire in its wake, while Fast as Wind is the floating head with the tusks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind'.
The content is as follows:
Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind are a duo of heads that will use two elements to attack, both causing fire damage. As you may have guessed through this Chapter so far, the Fireproof Mantle is one of the best bits of equipment you can bring along with you. Quick as Fire is the head on the ground that will roll toward you, leaving trails of fire in its wake, while Fast as Wind is the floating head with the tusks.
